title: New: John Maus – The Combine
body:
After announcing a tour earlier this year, the elusive John Maus has revealed his new record, Screen Memories, will be released through [Ribbon Music](http://ribbonmusic.

com/) on October 27th. Accompanying that nugget of good news, there’s a new song and psychedelic vid out in the wild. And what can I say other than it has Maus written all over it. Check out [The Combine](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_kF2-Cr6yX4) below…

And what can I say other than it has Maus written all over it. Check \[…\]
